thread.title: ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week
thread.title_full: ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week

title: ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week The Monarchs look to halt a 3 game losing streak for homecoming this Saturday when the host Charlotte. Post to Facebook ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week The Monarchs look to halt a 3 game losing streak for homecoming this Saturday when the host Charlotte.  //on.wvec.com/1LtdzAB   ODU Football feels it's ready after bye week Brian K Smith , 13News Now 9:56 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 CONNECT   
The Old Dominion football team got back to work after a bye week. They looking to end a three game slide this Saturday when they host Charlotte at 3:30pm. It's homecoming for the Monarchs. ODU's defense is steady, but on the other side of the ball, head coach, Bobby Wilder has been working on the offense getting better. The Monarchs get back from a bye week with their homecoming game against Charlotte on Saturday  //on.wvec.com/1LtdzAB TOP VIDEOS
